bug.author: ydye
bug.description:
<denchmark-code> # etcdctl cluster-health cluster may be unhealthy: failed to list members Error: client: etcd cluster is unavailable or misconfigured error #0: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:2379: getsockopt: connection refused error #1: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:4001: getsockopt: connection refused
</denchmark-code>
